title: Black Start Capability Test Plan
description: A system operator needs to create a plan to test the black start capability of a power plant, which is its ability to start up without help from the grid.

tasks.description: Review the plant's black start procedure documentation and the ISO's requirements for the test.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent summarizes the key steps and success criteria for the test.

tasks.description: Develop a detailed, step-by-step test plan, including safety protocols and communication plans with the ISO.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a comprehensive test plan document.

tasks.description: Schedule the test with the ISO and the plant operators for a low-demand period.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully coordinates and schedules the test.
